## durationToMilliseconds() function

### durationToMilliseconds() function

durationToMilliseconds convert a duration object to milliseconds

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function durationToMilliseconds(duration: Duration): number;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { durationToMilliseconds } from '@grafana/data';
```
<b>Parameters</b>

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  duration | <code>Duration</code> | datefns Duration object |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
